prompt:
How would you describe the way I use parentheses in my writing? Do I typically use them to add additional information or do I use them for other purposes?
I tend to use parentheses frequently throughout my writing, and I generally use them to provide additional context or clarify specific points. For instance:
• "My favorite author is (the late) John Green."
• "The dog barked (a few times), but it didn't bother me at all."
